translations: adj.贫困的；处于不利地位的；社会地位低下的
v.使处于不利地位（disadvantage 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 不幸儿童；生活条件差的儿童

sentences.sentence: Children living in inner-city areas may be educationally disadvantaged.
sentences.translation: 居住在市中心贫民区的孩子在教育方面可能处于不利的地位。

sentences.sentence: The same is not certain when it comes to students from more disadvantaged backgrounds.
sentences.translation: 对于家庭背景更贫困的学生来说，情况就不一定了。

sentences.sentence: He hopes he will be an inspiration for other young people from disadvantaged backgrounds.
sentences.translation: 他希望自己能激励其他来自贫困家庭的年轻人。
